content.description: Sit start with a big left hand sidepull and a right hand on the arete. From there, work the arete to its pinnacle, and mantel atop the boulder.
content.protection: A pad or two. The landing is great though.
content.location: It climbs the east side of Drive-Through's southeast arete.

content.description: Sit start with a left hand on the arete and a right hand on an opposing sloper. From there, bump the left hand up the arete, gain the right hand edge, reach the lip, and mantel on top.
content.protection: A pad. It has a great landing.
content.location: It climbs the south side of Drive-Through's southwest arete.

content.description: Stand start with your choice of edge. From there, climb straight up using the generous edges to reach an easy mantel.
content.protection: A pad. It has a great landing.
content.location: It climbs the center of Drive-Through's west facing slab.

content.description: Stand start with a right hand on the arete and palming the face with the left hand. From there, step up to an edge, bump the right hand up the arete, gain a left hand sidepull, reach the lip, and mantel on top the boulder.
content.protection: At least a pair of pads. The landing is uneven due some rocks.
content.location: It climbs the north face slab of Drive-Through.
